examples: The countryside was filled with charming, bucolic scenery, complete with rolling hills, fields of wildflowers, and quaint farmhouses.

definitions.definition: Relating to the pleasant aspects of rustic country life.
examples: The cozy bed and breakfast was located in a picturesque, bucolic setting, offering guests a chance to escape the city and enjoy the simple pleasures of the countryside.
Their traditional clothing and simple way of life reflected their bucolic roots as a community of shepherds and farmers.

secondary_definitions: Relating to the pleasant aspects of rustic country life.
